FuncDef: The display value-added-service edsg time-range process-information command displays the process of updating the EDSG service bandwidth based on a time range.
Examples: Number of users that fail to be updated      : 3
Number of users to be updated                : 3
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the time-range rate-limit command is run in the EDSG service policy view to configure a mapping between a time range template and EDSG service bandwidth, the EDSG service bandwidth is adjusted based on the configured time range. To view the process of updating the EDSG service bandwidth based on a time range, run the display value-added-service edsg time-range process-information command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
